inclusion.criterion: History of acute MI at least 4 weeks old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-ischemic LV dysfunction for at least 9 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Undergone ERI generator replacement of an FDA-approved ICD for primary prevention of SCD
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: ICD generator replacement for secondary prevention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability or unwillingness to provide valid informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association Class IV heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with pre-existing Class 1 indications for pacemaker therapy
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope.
